publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2689 Christine Grahame: Radio Borders-That the Parliament congratulates Radio Borders on celebrating its 12th anniversary and recognises the important service provided by local radio stations in airing matters of concern to their broadcasting constituencies, thus making them integral to the political and democratic process.
S1M-2689 Radio Borders (lodged on 1 February 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2689 Radio Borders (lodged on 1 February 2002) Michael Matheson*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2689 Radio Borders (lodged on 1 February 2002) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2689 Radio Borders (lodged on 1 February 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2689 Radio Borders (lodged on 1 February 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2689 Radio Borders (lodged on 1 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
